title: List of all Androidimage viewer   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidimage viewer   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: FrescoImageViewer
repoList.description: Customizable Android full screen image viewer for Fresco library supporting "pinch to zoom" and "swipe to dismiss" gestures. Made by Stfalcon

repoList.name: ImageStackViewer
repoList.description: This library provides an activity to show list of images in full screen with pinch to zoom support.

repoList.name: photoviewer
repoList.description: Android Library for View Image viewer

repoList.name: ImageViewer_RxJava
repoList.description: Android application which fetches image Urls from an API using RXJava and Retrofit libraries and display them in Recycler View using Picasso Library.The App also retrieves user contacts in csv file,zips it and stores it on phone's memory

repoList.name: PhotoViewer
repoList.description: PhotoViewer is a simple wrapper library for Android Compount Controls. Square Image View is an Image View with an square dimension. Rectangle Image View is an image View with a rectangle dimension. SpiralPhotoView is a view group which is used to place multiple image view that is portrait or landscape in a single Spiral view.
